title: [Gameplay] ward skin mix-up
body: I have the gentleman pork ward skin and whenever I have it on and upgrade my warding trinket to the pink one{{item:3362}}  it always shows the astronaut poro ward skin, this doesn't happen with regular green and pink wards or even the regular and upgraded trinket, this only happens with the pink upgraded trinket{{item:3362}} .

replies.body: This is a known issue, and we're working on a fix! Thanks for the report!
same thing to me.. i noticed it yesterday.. when i dropped my pink ward, the skin was the valentine bouquet ward skin.. and I don't even own that skin.
